install_msg: Ahoy, future Pirate King! ðŸ´â€â˜ ï¸ Thank you for installing the OnePieceAFK cog. Your grand adventure in the world of One Piece begins now! Use `[p]help OnePieceAFK` to see all available commands. May the winds be in your favor, and remember: the One Piece is real!
end_user_data_statement:
This cog stores user data essential for gameplay, including but not limited to:
â€¢ Adventure status and progress
â€¢ Bounty and currency amounts
â€¢ Crew affiliations and alliances
â€¢ Character skills, Haki levels, and Devil Fruit powers
â€¢ Inventory items
â€¢ Exploration history and achievements

All stored data is used to provide a persistent and engaging user experience. Users can request complete data deletion at any time, which will reset their in-game progress.
